definition: connection/contact/relation/to get in touch with/to integrate/to link/to touch
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: Star Wars are closely linked to conventional ground-combat.
sentences.chinese: 星球大戰與地面常規作戰之間有着密切的聯繫。

sentences.english: There exists a close relationship between plants and chiral compounds.
sentences.chinese: 植物與手性化合物存在着非常密切的聯繫。

sentences.english: No data are available to support a correlation between RGV and adverse event rates.
sentences.chinese: 目前尚無數據說明RGV與不良事件率之間的聯繫。

sentences.english: Please feel free to contact us for any questions you have.
sentences.chinese: 有任何問題，望直接與我們聯繫。

sentences.english: During the construction of socialistic new villages, people always confuse religion with feudal superstition.
sentences.chinese: 在農村中，人們往往把宗教與封建迷信聯繫在一起。

sentences.english: Both groups of diseases are strongly associated with poverty.
sentences.chinese: 這兩種病都與貧窮有很密切的聯繫。

sentences.english: VSO will obtain your consent before contacting referees.
sentences.chinese: 在聯絡你的聯繫人之前我們會徵得你的同意。

sentences.english: Connection among quasi-H closedness, weakly continuous mapping and compactness is also shown.
sentences.chinese: 並指出了擬H閉性與弱連續映射和緊性的聯繫。

sentences.english: There seems to be some majestic primeval connection between a man and a mountain.
sentences.chinese: 在男人與山之間似乎存在某種宏大的原始聯繫。

sentences.english: What motivates you to connect with a brand on a location-based service?
sentences.chinese: 什麼激勵你去把地理位置服務和品牌聯繫起來？

sentences.english: The link is the growing strain on the world"s sole superpower. America is locked into a draining and demoralising war."
sentences.chinese: 這個聯繫就是全球唯一超級大國面臨的壓力日益增加。

sentences.english: We need to be able to better understand the consequences of these connections.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要更好地把這些聯繫帶來的影響弄懂。

sentences.english: Keeping close contact with the masses is a good tradition of our Party.
sentences.chinese: 密切聯繫羣衆是我們黨的優良傳統。

sentences.english: You can do this by joining the tables and merging the information between them.
sentences.chinese: 您可以聯繫表格，併合並表格中的信息來完成這一點。

sentences.english: Jianchaling gold deposit is closed related to the Jianchaling ultrabasic rock mass.
sentences.chinese: 煎茶嶺金礦與煎茶嶺超基性岩體有密切的成因聯繫。

sentences.english: Supporters of the peg now have their response.
sentences.chinese: 而現在，聯繫匯率制的支持者腰板可以挺起來了。

definition: to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
to join/to connect/to link up/to communicate
variant of 關係|关系[guan1 xi5]
to take the initiative/to do sth of one's own accord/spontaneous/active/opposite: passive 被動|被动[bei4 dong4]/drive (of gears and shafts etc)
to know/to recognize/to be familiar with/to get acquainted with sb/knowledge/understanding/awareness/cognition
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
variant of 聯繫|联系[lian2 xi4]
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
